short_summary: Construction of two (2) canopies in Carcross, Yukon
description: Construction of two (2) wood canopies at the new detachment in Carcross, Yukon. The contract period will be for 32 weeks from the date of contract award. This procurement is subject to the Carcross/Tagish First Nation Final Agreement.
full_summary:
### [Construction of Canopies in Carcross, Yukon](#construction-of-canopies-in-carcross-yukon)

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting offers for the construction of two (2) wood canopies at the new detachment in Carcross, Yukon.

#### **Service Description**
The contractor will provide construction services for the canopies, with a contract period of 32 weeks from the date of contract award. The project is subject to the requirements outlined in the Carcross/Tagish First Nation Final Agreement.

#### **Solicitation Requirements**
* Bidders must submit a written bid, including copies of bid forms and any special instructions or amendments issued prior to the tender closing date.
* Documents may be submitted in either English or French, with an obligation to comply with any mandatory requirements.
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime, administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada, in relation to this solicitation.
* Bidders must consult the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for the most up-to-date solicitation information, as the RCMP will not be responsible for notification services offered by third parties.

#### **Additional Information**
* Indigenous businesses are encouraged to participate in this procurement process.
* The federal Indigenous Business Directory is an online resource to help identify Indigenous business capacity and eligibility criteria for federal contracts.
* Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### **Contact Information**
* Name: Brianne Leach
* Email: Brianne.Leach@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: (204) 430-1090

Additional attachment:
* *https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41649/construction-itt-two-phase-%28standard-carcross_final.pdf*

**Solicitation Details**

| Category             | Description                                                                                         |
|----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Procurement Category | Services                                                                                          |
| Procurement Method   | Competitive - Open Bidding                                                                  |
| Selection Criteria   | Lowest Price                                                                                  |
| Publication Date     | July 4, 2024                                                                                     |
| Tender Closing Date  | July 23, 2024, 2:00 PM EST |
